name: Add a new row to a Google Sheets spreadsheet from a Google Ads Lead Forms submission
description:
Please disable your ad blockers when working with our Google Ads apps. The ad blockers may cause unexpected behavior.

Every time a new Google Ads Lead form is submitted, Make will automatically add a new row to a Google Sheets spreadsheet. 

The template expects your lead form to collect at least these fields:
1) Full Name
2) User Email
3) User Phone

The template uses this [example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1_FJW6u9VNsp8NcTmiMKUyr80ox2WEUm73qh2IUktWxo/edit?usp=sharing) You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.
